org.ardenus.language

Class LanguageResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.resource.Resource
      • org.ardenus.language.LanguageResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, LanguageListener, ReusableStream<java.io.InputStream>

    public class LanguageResource
extends Resource
implements LanguageListener
    Represents a resource whose contents is based on the language being used.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin.

      • getDataId

        public java.lang.String getDataId()
        Overrides:
        getDataId in class Resource
        Returns:
        the ID of the data currently loaded. This must be overridden by resource classes whose data can update, as the data ID represents the currently loaded data.
